named-native-query.name: findInvoiceStrip
named-native-query.query: SELECT INVOICE_TYPE As invoiceType, INVOICE_SERIES As invoiceSeries, TOTAL_INVOICE As totalInvoice, END_INVOICE As endInvoice, TEMPLATE_CODE As templateCode, INVOICE_SERIES_TYPE AS invoiceSeriesType, INVOICE_CODE AS invoiceCode, INVOICE_SERIES_YEAR AS invoiceSeriesYear FROM INVOICE_STRIP WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS = :status AND TRANS_TYPE = :transType AND rownum = 1 AND TT78 = 1 AND INVOICE_SERIES_YEAR = :invoiceSeriesYear ORDER BY ORDER_NO, INVOICE_SERIES
